V

validateAndCopyPicture(File) - Method in class jpo.SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode
Validates the target of the picture copy instruction and tries to find the appropriate thing to do: 1.
validateCopyLocations() - Static method in class jpo.Settings
This method validates that the copy locations are valid directories and if not sets the entry in the copyLocations array to null.
validateDir(File) - Method in class jpo.ReconcileJFrame
helper method that returns true if the directory is a readable valid directory.
validateSettings() - Static method in class jpo.Settings
method that validates the settings & brings up the Settings dialog if not ok
validationType - Variable in class jpo.DirectoryChooser
Variable that records what type of validation this object must perform
verify(JComponent) - Method in class jpo.DirectoryChooser.FieldVerifier
 
verify(JComponent) - Method in class jpo.SettingsDialog.FileTextFieldVerifier
 
verifyChecksums - Variable in class jpo.IntegrityChecker
Variable that allows the verifyChecksums method to be terminated gracefully by setting it to false;
verifyChecksums() - Method in class jpo.IntegrityChecker
Checks all the nodes and adds checksums for those nodes that didn't have one
verticalPadding - Static variable in class jpo.ThumbnailJScrollPane
The amount of vertical padding between the thumbnails and descriptions.
